column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been long overdue for another visit here. For some reason I just don't make it down this area
column2: but I really should schedule a visit more often. Stopped in on this "chili" day
column3: just after the polar vortex rode through
column4: for some mighty tasty beef brisket chili. Funny how a 23° day after -51° wind chills
column5: feels like you don't need a jacket.
